name: Twilio Client Quickstart for Node/Express
description: A translation of the Twilio Client Python Quickstart.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account Sid, found right at the top of your console home landing page.

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token, found right below the account sid.

TWILIO_APP_SID.description: The SID of a TwiML App.  Programmable Voice --> Tools --> TwiML Apps.

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: A Twilio phone number you purchased and configured to use the previously mentioned TwiML App. Use the + and numbers, no parens or dashes.
